resources.string: Let\'s take a quiz to determine your visual guidance
we will only test on your first time using this app
Hello, which Barclays service do you want to go to?
Found 3 ATMs near you. Choose one you want to go to
How do you want to go there?
Ride an Uber to Barclays\' nearest ATM
Congratulations, you have reached your destination!
Yay! You have finished the Visual Guidance Quiz
